summary: AN ORDINANCE submitting a proposition to the qualified electors of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held on November 2, 1999, to delete Article II; delete Article V, Section 12; and delete Article IX of the Charter of the City of Seattle; and to change the headings of Article VII and Article VIII of said charter; and to amend Article XVII, Section 1 of said charter; all in order to eliminate obsolete reference therein to the City territory and boundary, the City Planner, the City Public Health Department and the City Board of Public Works, and the original salaries of elective officers; ratifying and confirming prior acts; calling on the City Clerk to certify the proposed amendments to the Director of Records and Elections of King County and directing such Director to submit the proposition to City voters; and providing for the publication of such proposed amendments.
